about_the_game:
Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?

Take Aim, Unleash Chaos!

Engage in intense urban warfare as you navigate the gritty streets, taking down enemies with precision and firepower. Every shot counts in this adrenaline-pumping battle for survival!

On Foot, On Target, On Fire!

Embrace the adrenaline-fueled chaos of ground combat as you sprint around the military truck, engaging enemies with lethal precision. With every well-placed shot, watch as foes fall and the vehicle erupts into a fiery explosion, signaling your victory in the heart of battle.

Raining Destruction from Above!

Ascend to the rooftops and rain fiery justice upon the enemy below. Operate the deadly turret with precision as you unleash devastation, turning enemy assets into explosive spectacles that light up the skyline.

Explosive Ambush Tactics!

Turn the tide of battle with a calculated explosion! Watch as enemies scatter like leaves in the wind when your perfectly timed shot detonates a car nearby, unleashing chaos and sending foes flying in all directions.

Grounded Fury, Skyward Justice!

Lock and load as you take aim at the sky-dominating threat. With nerves of steel and firepower to match, unleash a barrage of bullets at the incoming helicopter, watching triumphantly as it meets a fiery demise in a spectacular explosion.

Airborne Assault, Street-Level Mayhem!

Take command of the skies as you rain down destruction on the chaotic streets below. From the vantage point of your roaring helicopter, unleash a relentless barrage of gunfire, turning enemy vehicles into fiery wrecks in a display of aerial supremacy.

David vs. Goliath: Explosive Showdown!

Become the fearless underdog as you dart around the colossal mammoth tank, armed with nothing but a grenade launcher. With nerves of steel and precision aim, unleash a relentless barrage of explosives, chipping away at the behemoth's defenses until it finally succumbs to your relentless assault.


Fight a number of dangerous enemies, each with it's special strength and weaknesses!

Fly trough the city in a jetpack, different helicopters and even a jet fighter!

Every time you complete a mission, a new one is unlocked to provide you with endless hours of fun!

Highlights:

- 30 challenging high adrenaline levels
- 4 badass weapons with dozens of awesome power-ups
- 4 types of dangerous enemies
- 3 extremely nasty bosses
- 11 different vehicles to blow up
- over 3 warfare vehicles, including tanks, helicopters, and jetpacks
- variety of dynamic combat modes, from handheld firearms to turrets

Drive around shooting from tanks and missile turrets!
Do you like driving more than flying? All the vehicles featured in this game are controllable, even the tanks! Missile turrets you say? Sure, why not!

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes: There's a lot of shooting often depicted from a close-up and distant perspective with a mild amount of blood
